bug.short_desc: generate source fails after migration to 1.6

long_desc.thetext:
Hi Thomas, I tryed to migrate one of my projects from 1.5 to 1.6 After migration i get the following log. Generating of source fails, and I have no glue where to search for the problem:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Initializing: shopajx ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Processing configuration - Warning: ! Shadowing job "common" with local one - Warning: ! Shadowing job "build" with local one
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Executing: source::source-script ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Scanning libraries |'NoneType' object has no attribute 'type'
Best greets from DÃ¼sseldorf Torsten

Thorsten,
run a 'generate.py distclean'. If the issue reappears, run the generator with -s, and add the output to the bug. Also add the output from 'generate.py info'.

C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\shopajx>generate -s
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Initializing: shopajx ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Processing configuration - Warning: ! Shadowing job "common" with local one - Warning: ! Shadowing job "build" with local one
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Executing: source::source-script ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Scanning libraries \Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\bin\generator.py", line 230, in <module> main() File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\bin\generator.py", line 213, in main generatorObj.run() File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\Generator.py" , line 482, in run prepareGenerator1() File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\Generator.py" , line 415, in prepareGenerator1 self._libraries) = self.scanLibrary(config.get("library", [])) File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\Generator.py" , line 1922, in scanLibrary libObj.scan(cacheTime) File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\resource\Libr ary.py", line 212, in scan scanres = self._scanClassPath(timeOfLastScan) File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\resource\Libr ary.py", line 448, in _scanClassPath fileCodeId = self._getCodeId(clazz) File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\generator\resource\Libr ary.py", line 235, in _getCodeId className = treeutil.getClassName (qxDefine) File "C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo\tool\pylib\ecmascript\frontend\tre eutil.py", line 668, in getClassName if classNode.type == "call": AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'type'
C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\shopajx>generate info
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Initializing: shopajx ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Processing configuration - Warning: ! Shadowing job "common" with local one - Warning: ! Shadowing job "build" with local one
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Executing: info ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- >>> Environment information - Platform: Windows 7 6.1.7601 SP1 - Python version: 2.7.1 (r271:86832, Dec 5 2010, 12:04:08) [MSC v.1500 32 bit (Intel)] - qooxdoo path: C:\xampp\xampp\htdocs\QOOXDOO\qooxdoo - Framework version: 1.6 - Kit looks OK: True - Looking for generated versions... - Build version generated: False - Source version generated: False - Compile cache path is: c:\users\torste~1\appdata\local\temp/qx1.6/cache - Existing directory: True - Cache file revision: 28982 - Elements in cache: 1142 - Download cache path is: c:\users\torste~1\appdata\local\temp/qx1.6/cache/dow nloads - Existing directory: False >>> Done (0m00.28)

Could it be you have a .js file in your app that consists only of a comment?! There is a recent bug that concerns this, which shows the same symptom (bug#5928). If so, you could just remove the commented file, or experiment with adding a few instructions.

Not in normal code. But the hint was very helpful, and I also added a line for output of the processed files. The last processed file was shopajx/translations/C.js. These files where from 2008, but the project is much younger. I don't have this.tr somewhere in my code, I think therefore they are untouched? I deleted all files in that directory and now the generate source does the job for me.

(In reply to comment #4) > Not in normal code. But the hint was very helpful, and I also added a line for > output of the processed files. The last processed file was > shopajx/translations/C.js. These files where from 2008, but the project is much > younger.
Mh, then how came these old, old files into this "much younger" project?!
> I don't have this.tr somewhere in my code, I think therefore they are > untouched?
As long as I can remember (which is further back than 2008) translations were maintained in .po files, not .js. So I doubt it has anything to do with this.tr.
> I deleted all files in that directory and now the generate source does the job > for me.
What was the contents of C.js? This would be helpful in fixing the general problem.

Ah, thanks for posting. This must have been qooxdoo 0.7.x then (which was the last to have qx.locale.Locale). I wasn't actually aware that there was a transformation in place to translate .po files into .js files, as the comment indicates.
It also shows that calls to an unknown qx.*.define function break the current library scanning. But for my part, this bug could be resolved as a duplicate of the other bug I linked to.
Yes, thats fine. Thank you for support, hopefully you nevertheless had enough time for enjoying the 3.th advent today :-)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 5928 ***
